summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 70W, Page 167 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 6517-7th Avenue Southwest from Residential Single Family (SF 7200) to General Industrial (IG) Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Tom Bolser; C.F. 292848).
